title: Patching keeps resetting?
body:
After it scans about 400-600 files, I get "unspecified error" in the legacy client, and "unable to patch error" thing in beta client. Then it resets.
I left it on all night, roughly takes 5 minutes to scan that many files so it had many chances. Is anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: When your patcher stops midway, it needs to rescan your game files for corruption which is likely your specific issue.  The error happening at this point may indicate a security setting that's blocking the patch from scanning your game files.  You'll want to run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide for the fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Same deal here, feels bad man.
same problem, I'm searching the forums for a fix lol
